content.html: Just spoke to someone who was looking at a number of different companies for their next role. 2-3 days in the office was a dealbreaker. Do you know what companies that ruled out? Some of the biggest names in the business. Wonder how that’s going to play out.
content.value:
Just spoke to someone who was looking at a number of different companies for their next role.

2-3 days in the office was a dealbreaker.

Do you know what companies that ruled out? Some of the biggest names in the business.

Wonder how that’s going to play out.
